data.title: Careers
data.meta_description: Is a career at El Camino Hospital right for you? We offer a unique combination of cutting-edge technology, outstanding patient care and a sense of community.
data.text:
Accelerate Your Career at El Camino Health

At El Camino Health, you're more than an employee — you're part of something bigger. You are empowering one of the Bay Area's most innovative healthcare systems to deliver nationally recognized, compassionate and collaborative medical care. Through the El Camino Health Medical Network, we provide primary care, urgent care and specialty care services throughout Santa Clara County, California.

Our affiliated providers, nurses, specialists, care teams and staff work across over a dozen locations in Santa Clara County to help our patients, our neighbors, our families and friends live healthy and be well.

Find El Camino Health JobsFind El Camino Health Medical Network Jobs

Opportunity Abounds

The career opportunities at El Camino Health span across disciplines, roles, experience and interests. We employ thousands of individuals — and eagerly support them throughout their careers.

Our key hospital service lines include cancer care, cardiovascular care, maternity care, mental health and addiction services, orthopedics, pulmonology, and women's health. Our primary care, specialty care, and urgent care clinics are located throughout Santa Clara County.

We hope you will explore the opportunities available to join us on our journey.

Additional Opportunities

See About Us for more information about El Camino Health's related entities, such as the El Camino Health Foundation and Concern, Employee Assistance Program (EAP).

In addition, we have many other unpaid opportunities to get involved, such as the following:
